items.title: OpenObserve - Elasticsearch Compatibility
items.desc: OpenObserve offers Elasticsearch compatible API support with our zPlane add-on. With this feature, you can continue to use your existing Elasticsearch tools and queries while benefiting from the high performance and cost savings that OpenObserve offers. Visit Documentation to learn more.

items.title: Elasticsearch API Compatibility
items.desc: Use the same queries and tools you're familiar with, while harnessing the power of OpenObserve.

items.title: High performance
items.desc: Built in Rust, OpenObserve delivers high performance and scales up to petabytes of data.

items.title: Easy to use, built for scale
items.desc: Use of s3 backed storage and a resilient design makes it easy to use and scale.
